mapper.select: select cod as productCod, prodname from product

SELECT o.product_cod as productCod, YEAR(o2.order_date) AS year, MONTH(o2.order_date) AS month, SUM(o.qty) AS totalQty FROM orderdetail o JOIN orders o2 ON o.cod = o2.cod where o.product_cod = #{productCod} and YEAR(o2.order_date) = #{year} GROUP BY o.product_cod, YEAR(o2.order_date), MONTH(o2.order_date) ORDER BY o.product_cod, year, month
